meanings.definition: To give new strength or energy to
meanings.sent1: After a good night's sleep, I felt refreshed and ready for the day ahead.
meanings.sent2: I always feel refreshed after a long walk in the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The plants were refreshed by the rain, making them stand tall and proud.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words refreshed my spirit like a cool breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The cold drink refreshed me instantly, quenching my thirst and invigorating me.

meanings.definition: To make fresh or vigorous again
meanings.sent1: A quick nap can help you feel refreshed and full of energy.
meanings.sent2: The lemonade was so refreshing on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected compliment refreshed his mood and brought a smile to his face.
meanings.sent4: The vacation by the beach refreshed her mind, washing away all worries.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers in the garden always leaves me feeling refreshed and happy.
